20101204011134.000|20101204011136.000|CCO|EASILY.
20101204011136.000|20101204011138.000|CCO|>> Reporter: FANS OF KELLY 
20101204011138.000|20101204011140.000|CCO|CLARKSON TIPPED OFF POLICE THAT 
20101204011140.000|20101204011142.000|CCO|UNRELEASED MUSIC WAS FOR SALE ON
20101204011142.000|20101204011147.000|CCO|THE INTERNET.
20101204011147.000|20101204011152.000|CCO|TWO YOUNG MEN IN GERMANY USED A 
20101204011152.000|20101204011154.000|CCO|TROJAN HORSE ATTACHED TO AN MP3 
20101204011154.000|20101204011156.000|CCO|FILE SENT TO THE E-MAIL 
20101204011156.000|20101204011158.000|CCO|ADDRESSES OF THE SINGERS, THE 
20101204011158.000|20101204011200.000|CCO|MANAGERS AND THE RECORD COMPANY.

20101204011202.000|20101204011204.500|CCO|IT IS HIDDEN AND FINDS ITS WAY 
20101204011204.500|20101204011207.000|CCO|INSIDE YOUR COMPUTER.

20101204011209.500|20101204011212.000|CCO|INSTRUCTIONS TO FIND OTHER MP3 
20101204011212.000|20101204011214.500|CCO|SONGS, COPY THEM AND SEND THEM 
20101204011214.500|20101204011217.000|CCO|BACK OUT TO WHOEVER CREATED IT.
20101204011217.000|20101204011219.500|CCO|>> Reporter: THE HACKERS GOT 
20101204011219.500|20101204011222.000|CCO|AWAY WITH IT FOR NEARLY A YEAR.
20101204011222.000|20101204011223.667|CCO|HOW CAN THE AVERAGE PERSON 
20101204011223.667|20101204011225.333|CCO|PROTECT THEMSELVES?
20101204011225.333|20101204011227.000|CCO|>> WHEN YOU HAVE THE INTERNET 
20101204011227.000|20101204011228.667|CCO|THAT COMES TO YOUR HOUSE BE 
20101204011228.667|20101204011230.333|CCO|CONNECTED TO A ROUTER.
20101204011230.333|20101204011232.000|CCO|>> Reporter: HE SUGGESTS NOT
